Text:
Just so I'm not later accused of taking credit for someone else's work. The Commodore 64 remakes were made bya guy named "Mark vii" and are apparently quite rare. The NES tunes were ripped and converted to stereo by two excellent websites: 

http://playthenes.com/6.5.0.Tunes/6.5.0.Tunes.php

http://www.wez-projects.be/soundtracks.html
